definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: As on the preceding day, she wore her damask gown and her crape bonnet.
sentences.chinese: 她呢，和昨天一樣，花緞裙袍，縐紗帽。

sentences.english: Norwall Stripes & Damasks embrace simple to classically elegent stripes with coordinating damasks.
sentences.chinese: 條紋花緞牆紙採用簡單經典的彩色條紋與花緞搭配。

sentences.english: Norwall Stripes & Damasks embrace simple to classically elegent stripes with coordinating damasks.
sentences.chinese: 條紋花緞牆紙採用簡單經典的彩色條紋與花緞搭配。
